MrAftonNight1.text: Congrats on getting hired! I know you'll make a fine employee.
These tapes should help you understand the basics of what you'll be working with over the next few nights.
As you know, the animatronics here are programmed to scan for intruders.
Because of that, you'll be seen as one.
To avoid them from potentially attacking you, let me explain how they work.

MsAftonNight2.text: Hi, Hun!
Different voice this time around, huh?
Well, its nice to meet you!
I'm Mrs. Afton, but you can call me Rachel!
My husband Bill asked me to help record a few tapes over the week since he's dealing with...
...a lot of other matters right now.
Lemme see...
Ah-ha!
So, he recently fixed up the Armadillo animatronic,
-he nicknamed him Andy!
He said it works kind of like the others but can enter either of the party rooms.
It also starts in that little cove all by his lonesome.
Apparently, in that room with the Bulletin board, its stands on one side or the other.
Left or right.
For some reason, Andy'll go to the Party Room closest to him.
So the moment he does that you need to check the room he just entered.
After that, if you look at him for a lil',
-he'll then move his hiney back to where he came from.
Alright darling, that's all for tonight.
Have a good night!
Don't let the bed bugs bite!

MsAftonNight4.text: My hubby unfortunately couldn't record another tape so here I come to the rescue!
This time he told me that the "Mr. Hippo" bot,
-has been acting kinda suspect since he got it runnin' again.
Apparently, when he leaves the Showstage, some sort of...
(I think that is the right word..)
He appears in a few places he isn't.
"Just look for em' on the cams and he should go away!"
...he said that after you find one of the malfunctioning cams with him,
-so look for all of the glitched Hippos on the cams.
Anyways, I think that should be it!
